name: Survive The Corridors
description:
This is a little game in which you can achieve different scores depending on your play style. There is no average duration, it varies with your goal-score.

Eight levels are available which you can pass using a key. The key gets dropped by a zombie when you kill a specific amount of zombies in the current level.

Menu Background music: http://www.bensound.com

In Game music: https://www.youtube.com/user/revolverblack1 (Fayez Salka)
